leads.description: Are qualified customers and potential customers that may have a current or future need in which our services could potentially fullfill

opportunities.description: Are chance to discuss a particular need with a qualified customer or potential that also offers the possibility to estimate on that particular need.

estimates.description: Are a time and cost specific solution to a customers need based on specific requirements

jobs.description: Are time and cost estimates that have been approved by the customer and are now ready to be fullfilled based on their approved requirements.
